entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches developing late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the Atlantic coast late in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
